label: Extra Narrow
short_description: Feet are touching or extremely close. Maximizes outer quad sweep.

label: Narrow
short_description: Feet positioned slightly closer than hip-width.

label: Hip-Width
short_description: Feet directly under the hips. This acts as the baseline for Hinge movements (Deadlifts).

label: Shoulder-Width
short_description: Feet directly under the shoulders. This acts as the baseline for Squat movements.

label: Wide
short_description: Feet positioned wider than shoulders. Recruits the adductors and glutes heavily.

label: Extra Wide
short_description: Feet positioned extremely wide. Minimizes range of motion and maximizes inner thigh/glute leverage.
